aboutUs.title: Hello!
aboutUs.greeting: We are Misha and Daniela, a family team working in the field of modern electrical solutions and security systems.
aboutUs.mishaJob: Misha is responsible for important decisions and manages the team. He performs electrical installation and demolition work of any complexity level. Fast, high-quality and reliable - from replacing a socket to full electrical supply of rooms. Individual approach, affordable prices, warranty on all work. Works by agreement.
aboutUs.danielaJob: Daniela is a specialist in security systems and programming controllers for smart homes. She connects alarms, surveillance cameras, and sets up automation that makes your home truly "smart".

ourServices.title: Our Services
ourServices.hint: Click on a service to learn more

Connection of internet cable, TV, alarm systems
description.repJobs:
Fault detection and troubleshooting

Replacement of burnt wires, circuit breakers, outlets

description.consult:

description.smart:
Design and installation of smart home systems

Automation of lighting, climate control, security

Integration with mobile devices and voice assistants
description.support:

Troubleshooting and updates

User training and system optimization
description.surveillance:

Configuration of cameras and recording devices

Remote access and monitoring setup
description.safety:
Installation of alarm systems and sensors

Integration with smart home systems

24/7 monitoring and emergency response setup
